docs.lead_paragraph: Four Washington state electors who cast their vote for someone other than Democrat Hillary Clinton will each be fined $1,000 next week, the secretary of state's office said Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: His transition team has asked border officials for advice on where a barrier can be built, though the plan may involve fencing, a Texas congressman says.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and MANNY FERNANDEZ

docs.snippet: His transition team has asked border officials for advice on where a barrier can be built, though the plan may involve fencing, a Texas congressman says....
docs.abstract: Transition team for Pres-elect Donald J Trump is consulting with federal border agents in Texas about construction of new barriers along Mexico border; some local officials feel huge wall that became Trump's signature campaign promise could damage close economic ties between cities on either side of border and would prefer fences be installed.

headline.print_headline: Seeking a Path for a Mexico Barrier
headline.main: Trump Seeks Path for Mexico Barrier. But Will It Be a ‘Big, Beautiful Wall’?

docs.lead_paragraph: A sharp drop in cable news ratings following a presidential election is as inevitable as snow in Buffalo. Yet in the Age of Trump, so far Fox News Channel is defying that trend.
